column4: Can someone help me with a repositorie problem with unbuntu 7.10?
Anyone know why I am getting an error when I try to update my laptop?
Are you sure your BIOS is booting to the correct hard drive when you try to boot to Ubuntu?
Dude, if the hard drive boots when you select it in the LiveCD and NOT when you boot normally, it's GOT to be a BIOS problem.
Blah, no, that's wrong, could still be a bad GRUB install.
I agree with you its a bios problem
But my BEST GUESS is BIOS
well this installation cd has worked on all my other computers
Then it's probably BIOS. Get in there and find the boot order
there was no non usb hardrive optin in the boot order unfortuantely
Yea, you say that, but I don't believe you.
a94060: I agree, although I'm still not convinced the BIOS isn't to blame.
You probably need to get the new firmware from the Broadcom website.
you have any expierinace getting broadcom wireless cards working on laptops ubuntu 8.04?
